parameters.query:
SELECT
  u.id,
  u.slack_user_id,
  u.slack_username,
  u.email,
  u.role,
  u.google_calendar_credential_id,
  u.gmail_credential_id,
  u.google_docs_credential_id,
  u.google_sheets_credential_id,
  u.google_drive_credential_id,
  u.notion_credential_id,
  u.calendar_ids,
  u.preferences,
  u.is_active,
  u.created_at,
  u.updated_at,
  rp.permissions as effective_permissions
FROM alfred.users u
JOIN alfred.role_permissions rp ON u.role = rp.role
WHERE u.slack_user_id = $1 AND u.is_active = true

SELECT
  u.id,
  u.slack_user_id,
  u.slack_username,
  u.email,
  u.role,
  u.google_calendar_credential_id,
  u.gmail_credential_id,
  u.google_docs_credential_id,
  u.google_sheets_credential_id,
  u.google_drive_credential_id,
  u.notion_credential_id,
  u.calendar_ids,
  u.preferences,
  u.is_active,
  u.created_at,
  u.updated_at,
  rp.permissions as effective_permissions
FROM alfred.users u
JOIN alfred.role_permissions rp ON u.role = rp.role
WHERE u.slack_user_id = $1 AND u.is_active = true
